page.title: 08The Butcher Shop Barnby Dun
page.content: {Thomlinson the Butcher. Mr. Thomlinson's father had a butcher shop in 1924.They've been in their present shop since 1964.Before then they had another shop in Barnby Dun at the junction of High St. and Sycamore Rd.The present shop used to be a house. He used to have his own slaughterhouse until 1981.He buys some cattle from the cattle market but he gets most of his meat from the farmer's. They{make their own sausage and{cooked meat.}They also{bake pies to sell in the shop.They also sell chickens.They have their own grass to graze their cattle. Mr Thomlinson was born and lives in Barnby Dun. The business has been going for over{60 {years.
